list.name: Plugin List
list.content:
# Official Plugin
- [@distube/spotify](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/spotify): Spotify custom plugin.
- [@distube/soundcloud](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/soundcloud): SoundCloud extractor plugin.

dev.name: Plugin Development
dev.content:
# Plugin Development (WIP)
- This is a work in process, if you find something incomplete/missing, you can help us by contributing on GitHub (click `Source` icon on the top right corner) to make it better together.
- Plugins will provide data to DisTube for handling and playing song without having to edit the DisTube files to support other sites.

## Extractor Plugin
- Example: [@distube/soundcloud](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/soundcloud)

## Custom Plugin
- Example: [@distube/spotify](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/spotify)

construct.name: DisTube
examples: const Discord = require('discord.js'),    DisTube = require('distube'),    client = new Discord.Client();// Create a new DisTubeconst distube = new DisTube(client, { searchSongs: 10 });// client.DisTube = distube // make it access easilyclient.login("Your Discord Bot Token")

methods.name: play
methods.description: Shorthand method for {@link DisTube#playVoiceChannel}
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "play")        distube.play(message, args.join(" "));});

params.name: song
params.description: YouTube url | Search string | {@link Song} | {@link SearchResult} | {@link Playlist}

params.name: options.skip
params.description: Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added song/playlist instantly

params.name: options.unshift
params.description: Add the song/playlist to the beginning of the queue (after the playing song if exists)

methods.name: playVoiceChannel
methods.description: Play / add a song or playlist from url. Search and play a song if it is not a valid url.Emit {@link DisTube#addList}, {@link DisTube#addSong} or {@link DisTube#playSong} after executing

params.name: voiceChannel
params.description: The voice channel will be joined

params.name: song
params.description: YouTube url | Search string | {@link Song} | {@link SearchResult} | {@link Playlist}

params.name: options.skip
params.description: Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added song/playlist instantly

params.name: options.unshift
params.description: Add the song/playlist to the beginning of the queue (after the playing song if exists)

params.name: options.textChannel
params.description: Default {@link Queue#textChannel} (if the queue wasn't created)

params.name: options.message
params.description: Called message (For built-in search events. If this is a {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/Falsy|falsy value}, it will play the first result instead)

methods.name: playCustomPlaylist
methods.description: Play or add array of video urls.{@link DisTube#event:playSong} or {@link DisTube#event:addList} will be emittedwith `playlist`'s properties include `properties` parameter's properties such as`user`, `songs`, `duration`, `formattedDuration`, `thumbnail` like {@link Playlist}
examples: let songs = ["https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxx", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yyy"];    distube.playCustomPlaylist(message, songs, { name: "My playlist name" });    // Fetching custom playlist sequentially (reduce lag for low specs)    distube.playCustomPlaylist(message, songs, { name: "My playlist name" }, false, false);

params.name: songs
params.description: Array of url, Song or SearchResult

params.name: options.skip
params.description: Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added song/playlist instantly

params.name: options.unshift
params.description: Add the song/playlist to the beginning of the queue (after the playing song if exists)

params.name: options.parallel
params.description: Whether or not fetch the songs in parallel

methods.name: search
methods.description: Search for a song.You can customize how user answers instead of send a number.Then use {@link DisTube#play|play(message, aResultFromSearch)} or {@link DisTube#playSkip|playSkip()} to play it.

params.name: options.safeSearch
params.description: Whether or not use safe search (YouTube restricted mode)

methods.name: _newQueue
methods.description: Create a new guild queue

params.name: message
params.description: A message from guild channel | a voice channel

params.name: textChannel
params.description: A text channel of the queue

methods.name: _deleteQueue
methods.description: Delete a guild queue

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: getQueue
methods.description: Get the guild queue
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "queue") {        const queue = distube.getQueue(message);        message.channel.send('Current queue:\n' + queue.songs.map((song, id) =>            `**${id+1}**. [${song.name}](${song.url}) - \`${song.formattedDuration}\``        ).join("\n"));    }});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Pause the guild stream

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resume the guild stream

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stop the guild stream
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "stop") {        distube.stop(message);        message.channel.send("Stopped the queue!");    }});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: setVolume
methods.description: Set the guild stream's volume
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "volume")        distube.setVolume(message, Number(args[0]));});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

params.name: percent
params.description: The percentage of volume you want to set

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Skip the playing song
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "skip")        distube.skip(message);});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Play the previous song
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "previous")        distube.previous(message);});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: shuffle
methods.description: Shuffle the guild queue songs
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "shuffle")        distube.shuffle(message);});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: jump
methods.description: Jump to the song number in the queue.The next one is 1, 2,...The previous one is -1, -2,...
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "jump")        distube.jump(message, parseInt(args[0]))            .catch(err => message.channel.send("Invalid song number."));});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: setRepeatMode
methods.description: Set the repeat mode of the guild queue.Turn off if repeat mode is the same value as new mode.Toggle mode: `mode = null` `(0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 0...)`
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "repeat") {        let mode = distube.setRepeatMode(message, parseInt(args[0]));        mode = mode ? mode == 2 ? "Repeat queue" : "Repeat song" : "Off";        message.channel.send("Set repeat mode to `" + mode + "`");    }});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

params.name: mode
params.description: The repeat modes `(0: disabled, 1: Repeat a song, 2: Repeat all the queue)`

methods.name: toggleAutoplay
methods.description: Toggle autoplay mode
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command == "autoplay") {        let mode = distube.toggleAutoplay(message);        message.channel.send("Set autoplay mode to `" + (mode ? "On" : "Off") + "`");    }});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: addRelatedSong
methods.description: Add related song to the queue

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Enable or disable a filter of the queue.Available filters: {@link Filters}
examples: client.on('message', (message) => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if ([`3d`, `bassboost`, `echo`, `karaoke`, `nightcore`, `vaporwave`].includes(command)) {        let filter = distube.setFilter(message, command);        message.channel.send("Current queue filter: " + (filter.join(", ") || "Off"));    }});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

params.name: filter
params.description: A filter name, `false` to clear all the filters

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Set the playing time to another position
examples: client.on('message', message => {    if (!message.content.startsWith(config.prefix)) return;    const args = message.content.slice(config.prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/g);    const command = args.shift();    if (command = 'seek')        distube.seek(message, Number(args[0]));});

params.name: queue
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: emitError
methods.description: Emit error event

params.name: channel
params.description: Text channel where the error is encountered.

events.name: addList
events.description: Emitted after DisTube add a new playlist to the playing {@link Queue}
examples: distube.on("addList", (queue, playlist) => queue.textChannel.send(    `Added \`${playlist.name}\` playlist (${playlist.songs.length} songs) to the queue!`));

events.name: addSong
events.description: Emitted after DisTube add a new song to the playing {@link Queue}
examples: distube.on("addSong", (queue, song) => queue.textChannel.send(    `Added ${song.name} - \`${song.formattedDuration}\` to the queue by ${song.user}.`));

events.name: empty
events.description: Emitted when there is no user in the voice channel, {@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnEmpty is `true` and there is a playing queue.If there is no playing queue (stopped and {@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnStop is `false`), it will leave the channel without emitting this event.
examples: distube.on("empty", queue => queue.textChannel.send("Channel is empty. Leaving the channel"))

events.name: error
events.description: Emitted when {@link DisTube} encounters an error.
examples: distube.on("error", (channel, error) => channel.send(    "An error encountered: " + error));

params.name: channel
params.description: Text channel where the error is encountered.

events.name: finish
events.description: Emitted when there is no more song in the queue and {@link Queue#autoplay} is `false`.DisTube will leave voice channel if {@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnFinish is `true`
examples: distube.on("finish", queue => queue.textChannel.send("No more song in queue"));

events.name: initQueue
events.description: Emitted when DisTube initialize a queue to change queue default properties.
examples: distube.on("initQueue", queue => {    queue.autoplay = false;    queue.volume = 100;});

events.name: noRelated
events.description: Emitted when {@link Queue#autoplay} is `true`, the {@link Queue#songs} is empty andDisTube cannot find related songs to play
examples: distube.on("noRelated", queue => queue.textChannel.send("Can't find related video to play."));

events.name: playSong
events.description: Emitted when DisTube play a song.If {@link DisTubeOptions}.emitNewSongOnly is `true`, event is not emitted when looping a song or next song is the previous one
examples: const status = (queue) => `Volume: \`${queue.volume}%\` | Loop: \`${queue.repeatMode ? queue.repeatMode == 2 ? "Server Queue" : "This Song" : "Off"}\` | Autoplay: \`${queue.autoplay ? "On" : "Off"}\``;distube.on("playSong", (queue, song) => queue.textChannel.send(    `Playing \`${song.name}\` - \`${song.formattedDuration}\`\nRequested by: ${song.user}\n${status(queue)}`));

events.name: searchNoResult
events.description: Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0and DisTube cannot find any results for the query
examples: // DisTubeOptions.searchSongs > 0distube.on("searchNoResult", (message, query) => message.channel.send(`No result found for ${query}!`));

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchCancel
events.description: Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0and the search canceled due to user's next message is invalid number or timeout
examples: // DisTubeOptions.searchSongs > 0distube.on("searchCancel", (message) => message.channel.send(`Searching canceled`));

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchResult
events.description: Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0and song param of {@link DisTube#play|play()} is invalid url.DisTube will wait for user's next message to choose song manually.<info>{@link https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/7354993|Safe search} is enabledif {@link DisTubeOptions}.nsfw is disabled and the message's channel is not a nsfw channel.</info>

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchDone
events.description: Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0and after the user chose a search result to play

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: connect
events.description: Emitted when the bot is connected to the voice channel

events.name: disconnect
events.description: Emitted when the bot is disconnected to the voice channel

events.name: deleteQueue
events.description: Emitted when a {@link Queue} is deleted with any reasons.

events.name: finishSong
events.description: Emitted when DisTube finished a song

methods.name: _emitPlaySong

methods.name: playSong

methods.name: _handleSongFinish
methods.description: Handle the queue when a Song finish

methods.name: _handlePlayingError
methods.description: Handle error while playing

methods.name: isVoiceChannelEmpty
methods.description: Check if the voice channel is empty

methods.name: emit
methods.description: Emit the {@link DisTube} of this base

methods.name: play
methods.description: Execute if the url is validated

params.name: voiceChannel
params.description: The voice channel will be joined

params.name: skip
params.description: Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added song/playlist instantly

params.name: unshift
params.description: Add the song/playlist to the beginning of the queue (after the playing song if exists)

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Check if the url is working with this plugin

methods.name: getStreamURL
methods.description: Get the stream url from {@link Song#url}. Returns {@link Song#url} by default. Not needed if the plugin plays song from YouTube.

methods.name: getRelatedSongs
methods.description: (Optional) Get related songs from a supported url (Not needed to add {@link Song#related} and member is `null` because it will be added with this function later)

methods.name: resolve
methods.description: Execute if the url is validated (Not needed to add {@link Song#related} because it will be added with {@link Plugin#getRelatedSongs})

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Check if the url is working with this plugin

methods.name: getStreamURL
methods.description: Get the stream url from {@link Song#url}. Returns {@link Song#url} by default. Not needed if the plugin plays song from YouTube.

methods.name: getRelatedSongs
methods.description: (Optional) Get related songs from a supported url (Not needed to add {@link Song#related} and member is `null` because it will be added with this function later)

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Check if the url is working with this plugin

methods.name: getStreamURL
methods.description: Get the stream url from {@link Song#url}. Returns {@link Song#url} by default. Not needed if the plugin plays song from YouTube.

methods.name: getRelatedSongs
methods.description: (Optional) Get related songs from a supported url (Not needed to add {@link Song#related} and member is `null` because it will be added with this function later)

props.name: songs
props.description: List of songs in the queue (The first one is the playing song)

props.name: next
props.description: Whether or not the last song was skipped to next song.

props.name: prev
props.description: Whether or not the last song was skipped to previous song.

props.name: playing
props.description: Whether or not the stream is currently playing.

props.name: paused
props.description: Whether or not the stream is currently paused.

props.name: repeatMode
props.description: Type of repeat mode (`0` is disabled, `1` is repeating a song, `2` is repeating all the queue).Default value: `0` (disabled)

props.name: autoplay
props.description: Whether or not the autoplay mode is enabled.Default value: `false`

props.name: filters
props.description: Enabled audio filters.Available filters: {@link Filters}

props.name: beginTime
props.description: What time in the song to begin (in seconds).

props.name: textChannel
props.description: The text channel of the Queue. (Default: where the first command is called).

props.name: currentTime
props.description: What time in the song is playing (in seconds).

methods.name: addToQueue
methods.description: Add a Song or an array of Song to the queue

params.name: position
params.description: Position to add, < 0 to add to the end of the queue

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Pause the guild stream

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resume the guild stream

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stop the guild stream

methods.name: setVolume
methods.description: Set the guild stream's volume

params.name: percent
params.description: The percentage of volume you want to set

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Skip the playing song

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Play the previous song

methods.name: shuffle
methods.description: Shuffle the queue's songs

methods.name: jump
methods.description: Jump to the song number in the queue.The next one is 1, 2,...The previous one is -1, -2,...

methods.name: setRepeatMode
methods.description: Set the repeat mode of the guild queue.Turn off if repeat mode is the same value as new mode.Toggle mode: `mode = null` `(0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 0...)`

params.name: mode
params.description: The repeat modes `(0: disabled, 1: Repeat a song, 2: Repeat all the queue)`

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Enable or disable filter of the queue.Available filters: {@link Filters}

params.name: filter
params.description: A filter name, `false` to clear all the filters

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Set the playing time to another position

methods.name: addRelatedSong
methods.description: Add a related song of the playing song to the queue

methods.name: toggleAutoplay
methods.description: Toggle autoplay mode

methods.name: emit
methods.description: Emit the {@link DisTube} of this base

props.name: isLive
props.description: [Video only] Indicates if the video is an active live.

classes.name: Song
classes.description: Class representing a song.<info>If {@link Song} is added from a YouTube {@link SearchResult} or {@link Playlist}, some info will be missing to save your resources.It will be filled when emitting {@link DisTube#playSong} event.Missing info: {@link Song#likes}, {@link Song#dislikes}, {@link Song#streamURL}, {@link Song#related}, {@link Song#chapters}, {@link Song#age_restricted}</info>

props.name: info
props.description: `ytdl-core` raw info (If the song is playing)

props.name: isLive
props.description: Indicates if the video is an active live.

props.name: age_restricted
props.description: Whether or not an age-restricted content

methods.name: _patchYouTube
methods.description: Patch data from ytdl-core

methods.name: _patchOther
methods.description: Patch data from other source

methods.name: formatDuration
methods.description: Format duration to string

methods.name: toSecond
methods.description: Convert formatted duration to seconds

methods.name: parseNumber
methods.description: Parse number from input

methods.name: isURL
methods.description: Check if the string is an URL

typedefs.name: QueueResolvable
typedefs.description: Data that resolves to give a {@link Queue} object. This can be:- A {@link Queue}- A guild ID string- A {@link https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/Snowflake|Snowflake}- A {@link https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/Message|Message}- A {@link https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/VoiceChannel|VoiceChannel}- A {@link https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/StageChannel|StageChannel}- A {@link https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/VoiceState|VoiceState}

props.name: emitNewSongOnly
props.description: If `true`, {@link DisTube#event:playSong} will not be emitted when looping a song or next song is the same as the previous one

props.name: leaveOnEmpty
props.description: Whether or not leaving voice channel if the voice channel is empty after {@link DisTubeOptions}.emptyCooldown seconds.

props.name: leaveOnFinish
props.description: Whether or not leaving voice channel when the queue ends.

props.name: leaveOnStop
props.description: Whether or not leaving voice channel after using {@link DisTube#stop|stop()} function.

props.name: savePreviousSongs
props.description: Whether or not saving the previous songs of the queue and enable {@link DisTube#previous|previous()} method

props.name: searchSongs
props.description: Limit of search results emits in {@link DisTube#event:searchResult} event when {@link DisTube#play|play()} method executed. If `searchSongs <= 1`, play the first result

props.name: youtubeCookie
props.description: YouTube cookies. Read how to get it in {@link https://github.com/fent/node-ytdl-core/blob/997efdd5dd9063363f6ef668bb364e83970756e7/example/cookies.js#L6-L12|YTDL's Example}

props.name: youtubeIdentityToken
props.description: If not given; ytdl-core will try to find it. You can find this by going to a video's watch page; viewing the source; and searching for "ID_TOKEN".

props.name: updateYouTubeDL
props.description: Whether or not updating youtube-dl automatically.

props.name: customFilters
props.description: Override {@link DefaultFilters} or add more ffmpeg filters. Example=`{ "Filter name"="Filter value"; "8d"="apulsator=hz=0.075" }`

props.name: searchCooldown
props.description: Built-in search cooldown in seconds (When searchSongs is bigger than 0)

props.name: emptyCooldown
props.description: Built-in leave on empty cooldown in seconds (When leaveOnEmpty is true)

props.name: nsfw
props.description: Whether or not playing age-restricted content and disabling safe search in non-NSFW channel.
